creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Mr and Mrs Makiji Hase
description: three lines of looping calligraphy; smaller line at L edge and at LLQ; yellow mount with sea foam green upper and lower borders
inscription:
Signature, Seals, and Sticker

(The garden persimmons are all red; the chestnuts green; / Why should I have to leave you at this moment? / You have been so marvelously hospitable, / I shall not wait for the trees to bud again before I return.) (SA) (See file)
markings: LLC, two square intaglio seals; sticker on R roller end: [Hanko]
title: Farewell Poem
